movies.title: Zones intimes
movies.plot: A comedy centered on a sexually adventurous young woman who is trying to be the perfect wife, mother, and lover.
movies.simplePlot: A comedy centered on a sexually adventurous young woman who is trying to be the perfect wife, mother, and lover.

biography.bio: Lavinia Wilson was born on March 8, 1980 in Munich, Bavaria, Germany. She is an actress and producer, known for Æon Flux (2005), Alone (2004) and Tandoori Love (2008).
biography.name: Lavinia Wilson

biography.bio: Jürgen Vogel was born on April 29, 1968 in Hamburg, West Germany as Jürgen Peter Vogel. He is an actor and producer, known for The Wave (2008), Le libre arbitre (2006) and Life is All You Get (1997).
biography.name: Jürgen Vogel

biography.bio: Juliane Köhler was born on August 6, 1965 in Göttingen, Lower Saxony, Germany. She is known for her work on Downfall (2004), Nowhere in Africa (2001) and Aimee & Jaguar (1999).
biography.name: Juliane Köhler

biography.bio: Anna Stieblich was born on February 20, 1965 in Bremen, Germany. She is an actress, known for Family Mix (2006), Türkisch für Anfänger (2012) and SOKO Leipzig (2001). She is married to Didi Danquart.
biography.name: Anna Stieblich

biography.bio: Robert Gwisdek was born on January 19, 1984 in Berlin, Germany. He is an actor, known for Move (2012), Kohlhaas oder die Verhältnismäßigkeit der Mittel (2012) and Circuit (2013).
biography.name: Robert Gwisdek

biography.bio: Amira Pollmann was born 2002 as daughter of the Actress Astrid Ann Pollmann and actor Erdogan Atalay. She is also the stepdaughter of Make up artist Katja Ohneck. The current girlfriend of father Erdogan Atalay. Pollmann played her debut in a small role as Lucia Bradl in the 'SOKO 5113' episode Für meine Tochter.
biography.name: Amira Pollmann

biography.bio: Isabelle Redfern was born in 1976 in Munich, Bavaria, Germany. She is an actress, known for Alles aus Liebe (2016), Zones intimes (2014) and Eine Mutter kämpft um ihren Sohn (1994).
biography.name: Isabelle Redfern

biography.bio: Rainer Galke was born on August 8, 1971 in Meerbusch, Germany. He is an actor, known for Frau Müller muss weg! (2015), Zones intimes (2014) and Fritz Lang (2016).
biography.name: Rainer Galke

biography.bio: Jonathan Neo Völk is an actor, known for Zones intimes (2014), Zwischen den Jahren (2017) and Miss Sixty (2014).
biography.name: Jonathan Neo Völk

biography.bio: Jan-David Bürger was born in 1993 in Essen, North Rhine-Westphalia, Germany. He is an actor, known for Jetzt Jetzt Jetzt (2013), Nothing as It Was (2013) and The Bleak Farm (2016).
biography.name: Jan-David Bürger

biography.bio: Mira Schröder is an actress, known for Zones intimes (2014).
biography.name: Mira Schröder

biography.bio: Ansgar Schröder is an actor, known for Zones intimes (2014).
biography.name: Ansgar Schröder

biography.bio: Bettina Engelhardt was born in 1971 in Germany. She is an actress, known for D.I.K. - Jagd auf Virus X (2003), Frau zu sein bedarf es wenig (1998) and Zones intimes (2014).
biography.name: Bettina Engelhardt

biography.bio: Tanja Schleiff was born in 1973 in Erfurt, Thuringia, Germany. She is an actress, known for Downfall (2004), Voeux et sacrifices (2007) and The Red Cockatoo (2006).
biography.name: Tanja Schleiff

biography.bio: Richard van Weyden was born in Heiligenwald/Saar in 1966. Due to his father's work (a collier and specialist for welding technology), he spent the first years of his childhood in Nancy, Hamburg, Berlin, Hong Kong and Cape Town until his school enrollment in Frankfurt am Main. He quit school went to Rome and worked for several month as a shoeshine boy in a shoe-store. Nevertheless, he spent most of his time in the cinema watching movies. Back in Germany he joined different independent actor ensembles, touring the Repuplic of Germany, Austria and Switzerland whilst working as a prop master, light-tone technician, scene painter. He went to Paris for a while and lived in an artist commune. In 1986 Michael Cacoyannis (Alexis Sorbas) discovered him in the actor's canteen at the Staedtischen Buehnen Frankfurt, instructed him and immediately gave him a part in his opera production of Iphigenia. This special experience led to the decision to become an actor and a time of education to many different places followed. Since then he works as an actor for cinema, TV and theatre and also lent his voice to commercials and to famous characters (Conan, Sherlock Holmes, Cars, Pirates of the Caribbean...) for computer-games in Germany. In his free time, he writes short story's, sketches unusable furniture, works as a sculptor and painter and improves upon his English, French and Italian language skills.
biography.name: Richard van Weyden
